original_text: But the husband or wife who does not believe in Christ may want to leave. If they want to become separate, let them do that. If that happens, the Christian man or woman is now free. God wants you to live in peace.
korean_text: 혹 믿지 아니하는 자가 갈리거든 갈리게 하라 형제나 자매나 이런 일에 구애될 것이 없느니라 그러나 하나님은 화평 중에서 너희를 부르셨느니라

sentences.original_text: But the husband or wife who does not believe in Christ
If they want to become separate
the Christian man or woman is now free
God wants you to live in peace
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 여러분이 평화 속에서 살기 원하십니다
